display_long_description:
Welcome to the first rideable slice of Off Track VR — a physics-based sandbox for bike lovers, tricksters, and explorers in VR.

This early prototype focuses on core gameplay: smooth riding, stunt-ready bikes, and varied terrain to test your skill and flow. No fluff, just pure riding freedom.

🛞 What’s in this Prototype
6 Unique Bikes to ride and swap mid-session:
🏍 Dirt Bike
🧗‍♂️ Trial Bike
🔥 Super Moto
🛵 Scooter
🧭 Adventure Bike
🛻 ATV (4-wheeler)

3 Open Maps to explore and ride freely:
🌲 Forest Track – smooth curves and dirt trails
🛞 Dirt Bike Track – jumps, loops, and tight turns
🏔 Mountain Roads – scenic views with light AI traffic

Sandbox Experience:
- No time limits.
- No objectives.

Discover the physics, enjoy the terrain, and just ride.

🎯 What's Coming Next
This is just the beginning. We're building Off Track VR into a full sandbox riding experience with:

- Multiplayer rooms
- Dynamic time and weather
- City maps with pedestrians and traffic
- Bike customization
- Challenges, stunts, and unlockable content
